meanings.sent1: At the book fair, the booksellings were brisk as people eagerly bought their favorite novels.
meanings.sent2: She decided to start a small booksellings business online, specializing in rare editions.
meanings.sent3: The booksellings at the bookstore were so successful that they ran out of shelves to display all the books!
meanings.sent4: His passion for booksellings was like a flame that never flickered, always burning bright.
meanings.sent5: The booksellings in the quaint little shop had a magical charm that drew in customers from far and wide.

meanings.definition: The profession or business of selling books.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally achieved success in the competitive world of booksellings.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of owning their own booksellings store, surrounded by shelves of literary treasures.
meanings.sent3: The booksellings industry can be tough, but she loved every moment of it.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the booksellings business thrived, catering to the diverse reading tastes of the population.
meanings.sent5: His dedication to the booksellings trade was unwavering, always striving to provide the best books to his customers.
